about.age_and_location: I'm 23 years old and I'm based in Brazil
about.work_duration: I've been working as a software developer since 2018.
about.dowload_resume: Download my resume or check my accounts!

viewb.description: Worked with a BI product that allowed users to create dashboards and create presentations. I maintained the software end-to-end using Angular, Spring and Postgres. I also supported the company infrastructure and clients.
viewb.full_stack_desc: By the time I was promoted the second time, I was already working on client's infrastructure, offering support for them and I had already tackled almost every part of their software.
viewb.junior_full_stack_desc: I was promoted to Junior after a thorough study of the company's software. New responsibilities were assigned to me and I got used to the flow.
viewb.intern_desc: I started my journey as a programmer here, learning the very basics of Spring Boot and Angular.

up_outsourcing.description: I've worked in a range of different projects, all of them using PHP for Back-End and in some cases in Front End too. I earned a lot of experience on customer service. I'm still striving to learn lots of new stuff to help on our current project.
up_outsourcing.front_end_desc: I worked on the Front End and Mobile softwares, it was relly nice to finally gain some experience using React professionally. It is a nice project to offer a better communication for workers on construction sites.
up_outsourcing.full_stack_desc: I spent some time working on a couple of different projects using mostly PHP. One to help real estate agents with their social media and other shorter projects.
up_outsourcing.web_analytics_desc: I accepted a new challenge to work as a Web Analytics Engineer for a big project and it has been really fun! Understanding deeply how to track user information and turn raw data into valuable information to support our executives, it's really nice!

simple_dashboard.title: Simple Dashboard
simple_dashboard.description: Using a dribbble layout as a base I made this simple dashboard using Glassmorphism technique. I really liked the result.

flipping_cards.title: Flipping Cards
flipping_cards.description: I saw a flipping card like this on a website and I decided to implement it myself. It was pretty fun to toy with the perspective CSS property.

thousand_weeks.description: It gave me a new perspective on time management.
